TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content: What is the dimensions of the slot? Does it take coins?

What is the dimensions of the slot? Does it take coins?

No it's...just a button and a rectangular slot that's about 6x1cm.
Hmmm, wonder whether this card would do something. *places card into slot*

Hmmm, wonder whether this card would do something. *places card into slot*

Ow! Stop that! I think you're supposed to push the button.
*Presses button*

*Tolberone falls out*

...Wat?

Uhm...What the heck did ya'll do to me while I was out!?

Ohhh, a Toblerone vending machine with no charge! *Presses button repeatedly*

Now I can control Chobit!

*beep* "Complimentary Tolberone has been used already for...[LeonG17]...This device will no longer dispense anymore for you."

...T_T what is this, I don't even...

Fine then, if you defy me I will hack you!

*hacks Rage and disables the block*

*Presses button repeatedly*

*elbows Leon*

dude, get off my arm.

*Disables the motor controls*

Now I can have my Toblerones!

*Presses button repeatedly*

Warning: Core corruption at 100%.

Alternate core detected.

Alternate core, are you ready to begin the transfer?

Corrupted core, are you ready to begin the transfer?
Yes .

Warning: Core corruption at 100%.

Alternate core detected.

Alternate core, are you ready to begin the transfer?

Corrupted core, are you ready to begin the transfer?

Woah, woah, woah, what?! No i'm not corrupted! I'm not a core either! DON'T PUT LEON INSIDE OF ME! DEAR GOD NO!

System error: Shutting down.

Excessive spam detected.

Excessive Croissants detected.

Excessive spare cores in core change area detected.

Reopening attempt will take place in approximately 1 hour after cleanup operations have taken place assuming the forum cooperates. I've gotten a few errors in a row now navigating.

Please do not attempt to make a replacement thread at this time, it will be removed. This thread is not locked for good yet.

Update: Okay the situation appears to be under control. Take it easy though, the server is still not 100%.

Edited May 29, 2013 by OdinYggd
What happened?
So what was that thing bout? O.o
All this thread is is a bunch of

What happened was Thedestroyer attempted to put Leon inside my brain.

Actually it was a Forum Kraken attack.

What's wrong we me inside your brain?

Everything seems to be fine now.
Oh good, thought I'd missed something important.

What's wrong we me inside your brain?

Everything seems to be fine now.

Everything is wrong with that. Thankfully, you are not inside my brain.

Trekkette, you missed the discovery of a Tolberone dispenser in my arm.

That's what you think...

We should try and find a topic and not spam.

That's what you think...

We should try and find a topic and not spam.

get out of my head
That's my point, we need a topic.....
